collectible.title: Fate's Calling Cards
collectible.subtitle: They surge with luck
collectible.text: Three primary colored cards with a strange feeling to them. You feel like you could get away with things you never would while holding them. Why would Twisted Fate give you these?

collectible.title: Fate's Hat
collectible.subtitle: Fine Ionian Silk
collectible.text: Being beat repeatedly, Fate wagers his beloved hat and play's to his full extent. You managed to defeat Fate at his best and being a man of his word, he hands over his hat after hes completely out of the game.
